name: Find my friends
description:
All my friends are lost in the dark. Will you help me find them?

Help the plips find each other in the darkness, watch over them while they make their way to their destination. Be careful, for many dangers lurk in the dark and will try to snatch them.

The plips usually stay near a light source, and monsters don’t like the light.

Use WASD to move camera Left click to throw down the glowstick where you want them to go

Code: Wiljam “xWilQ”

Audio: Roni “Haastaggi”

Art: Eli “Catlord”

Programs used: Unity, Garageband, Adobe Premier Pro, Firealpaca

Game made during the Ludumdare 46 Gamejam
